Twin Forks - Cross My Mind
Girl it's really good to see you come around女孩，很高興看到你~
I know you been lost, I'm glad you got found很高興能再見到過去杳無音訊的你
Cause I've been a little lost myself
我還曾因此而失落過~
Found an old picture of you on my phone我在手機裡找到你以前的照片Got a new feeling now I won't let go突然有些全新的感受 而我沉浸其中
Til I can, I can tell you for myself
直到有一天  可以告訴你我的心意
Why don't you stay for a while可以再留下來一下下嗎
It's been too long since I've smiled我好久沒有這麼開心了
There's too few people I trust這世上很少人能讓我信賴
I won't ask you for too much我不會要求你太多的
Good conversation and such只要能跟我聊聊天
And if I'm being honest
希望我能表現得誠實點
From time to time一次又一次
You cross my mind你浮現在我腦海
Good company is hard to find這麼美好的關係很難再有了From time to time一次又一次
You cross my mind你浮現在我腦海
So stay with me就留下來陪我
Just for the night
只要今夜
Got an old record in a beat up sleeve在破爛的袖口上紀載著我們的回憶
That same sad song that you sang to me還有那首你總是唱給我聽的悲傷情歌
Back when you couldn't say it for yourself投奔我吧當你發現無法再為自己的感覺辯解
Look I'd be lying if I said to you從前我也對你掩飾自己
That I know exactly what I should do現在我知道該怎麼做了
